name: Heart Attack (itch) (lazlobarragan, rusty fishburger, Woon66)
description:
Heart Attack is a game made for the Godot Wild Jam#30

Protect your heart through 10 waves of enemies.

Default controls:

Left Mouse  - Shoot arrow or Build

Right Mouse - Destruct Buildings (if you have one selected)

Mouse Wheel Button - Open building menu

Hold Mouse Wheel Button - Select building

Release Mouse Wheel Button - Use Building
